data.text: @Eric_Colasurdo @PokerPolitics Yep. They were doing the responsible thing to PREVENT bad vaccine reactions and it's been twisted into something it's not.
@PokerPolitics Imagine trying to argue that you’re the weird one at a social gathering who keeps blathering about things other people don’t actually care about
@PokerPolitics Everything is a distraction from everything else.
@PokerPolitics Referring to non Q people as npcs is telling. Distances themselves from the pain and suffering of people.

@PokerPolitics Reality: Jan 6 is quietly in many people's minds. Nobody likes Trump, not even the GOP (maybe Putin). War is weighing heavily, and the public in general is giving Biden high marks on it. His approval is improving. People know oil prices and worldwide inflation aren't his fault.
